title: Meta is getting stale all over again.
body:
The meta is becoming stale all over again. Every game in the final 4 is just Ocean Mages and Glacial Pred Poison. Those comps really need a nerf and they should really buff other comps because they cant compete. Buffs should go out Rangers, Blademasters, Electric with reworks/new set bonuses to Desert, Warden, and Druids. Lastly there needs to be more characters in Druids, Woodlands, Steel, Crystal, Electric, Blade Masters, Cloud, Mystic, and Desert. Units that need a huge nerf are Olaf, Brand, Annie, and Kindred. Units that need buff are Azir, Neeko (Needs to use her ult on a group instead of her randomly throwing it on one person), Skarner (still), Maokai, Ornn, and Taliyah.

This is how the meta feels right now and I pointed out what a majority of players Ive talked to feel what should happen to the game. I honestly enjoyed TFT but the way the meta is I dont want to play it until things change.

replies.body:
Hot take here: something is really really wrong with the champion distribution and the pool size. Today I wanted to go Cloud & Blademasters and even though nobody was going for Yasuo, I could only find like 5 of him the entire game? Meanwhile others were building their second lv2 Volibear and lv3 Kog'maw. This happens in many games. The small pool size seems really biased towards certain composition. For example it is extremely risky to build full Light, because the game somewhat barely gives Aatrox. Like really, in some games I didn't even get him dropped at all even though nobody was going for either Blademasters or Light.

Those builds wouldn't be so strong, because e.g Predator heavily relies on getting champs to lv3. The problem is that the small pool size makes it way too easy through hyperrolling. Part of this problem is that Tier 5 champions aren't that potent like they were in Set 1 (except Singed). And even then the system seems to be biased towards Singed, because I get him dropped most frequently.

Yup, I just posted about this a week ago. I was the only person in a game who built summoners, I hyper rolled at lvl6 then at lvl7 and I didn't get a single Annie or Yorick, meanwhile 3 ppl who built the same comp just got everything they needed. Also Aatrox and Soraka are probably the rarest units in the game. I see more Zed than Aatrox, no joke.

It would be actually better if it was rng because rigth now it is not! Riot just cannot program real rng as we can see.

Aggreed, I often try something  off meta just for some changes but its is harder to find some units, like Soraka and Janna. Consequently, we are wasting more money rerolling than building a strong strategy.
I agree with both of you the champion pool needs to be fixed, it's so annoying when you scout for a comp you want to go for and still can't get it even when no one is going for the units you want.
I think one of the reasons ocean mages are common is because most of the champions are common low cost units. Plus two of the champions (Vlad and Syndra) are ocean mages.

I've wanted to build blademasters but due to rng (despite them rarely being built) I can't seem to get more than a 2 star siv OR a 2 star aartox at the same time. Yas is probably the only easy unit to get to 2 stars.. Rng has allowed me to get 3 blade master bonus once and even then just got destroyed due to poor rng. Sadly, unless you throw the first few rounds so badly you get a chance at first carousel pick (and maybe a spat depending where you spawn on the carousel map/where the spat is) you won't build bm from spat items either.. Even if you get a couple of spat, you need good enough rng to get a bow off of creeps.. And for w/e reason, my creeps like giving me gold. When I do get items, they are very rarely bows.
Oh well, will keep doing the same ole pred/poison/zerker/olaf build every game.. Fun!!
Again they just need to make more champs in the game, it easier to go predator, glacial, poison or light or ocean mages because there are just more of them
Check out the PBE changes.  They buffed a whole lot that wasn't Preds/poison, glacial, or ocean/mages.  They've got it handled.

AP in general needs a huge nerf or buff MR in the game. There is a warden trait that gives a lots of armor... which is almost totally useless since 90% of the champions deal magic damage and the rest deal mostly true damage. Meanwhile, there is no counter against the ridiculous amount of AP damage. Mystic gives MR theoretically but there are two problems with it: 1. Soraka is so rare that I see way more Zed, YI, Lux, etc. than her 2. 40 MR is laughable, useless. When my Reksai with dragon claw and PD gets literally one-shot (100-0) by a Veigar I honestly don't see what is the point in building MR besides wasting resources.

Aatrox also needs a buff imo. I consider him as the weakest unit in the game. He needs way to much mana for ult but even then 90% of the times he just dies within his horribly long ult animation. Just buff his ult by reducing its mana cost and make his animations faster. I wouldn't buff Neeko and Maokai. Neeko is kinda broken when she hits a group with her ult. The fact she ults single targets sometimes is part of the rng that affects every other champion as well (veigar ults an already that unit or  Jax stuns a single target).
they should remove olaf from Glacial and place him on Electric complete bonus from glacial should come from a lux or a spatula.
I don't like building armor items and still being melted/one shot by ad champs or buying MR items and being melted/one shot by ap champs
